invocations.description: Requests a decimal point number from the user. This can only be called from the inputevents(table e) function. The question parameter is the question to ask the user and the default parameter is the default value to be shown. A request id can be specified in the requestid parameter. This request id will be passed to the inputevents function as the e.value1 parameter to identify later on what was requested. The e.type parameter will be IEVENT_REQUESTFLOAT and e.value2 will represent the chosen float number.
